name: Kahockey
description:
GAMEPLAY:
Kahockey, or Chaotic Hockey, a game where you play as the metal disk in air hockey.
There are enemies on the table: if they touch you, they explode!
Any explosion will reduce your health bar if you are nearby.
If it gets to zero, you'll catch fire and break any wall you hit.
You die when you fall out of (control) the table.

HOW TO PLAY:

Mouse AimLeft mouse buttonShootEscGo back to the main menuNToggle sound effectsMToggle musicBDecrease/increas the overall volume

SCORE:

Shooting an enemy60 ptsHitting an enemy50 ptsEvery second of surviving5 pts

THEME:
Most of your movements depend on how the objects around hit you. You have no control over it, except lightly pushing yourself with recoil.

KNOWN BUGS:
If you type the letters B, N, M when choosing your name, they operate on the sound volume as they would during the game
